<!--Text-->
"A thread detached during database operation and failed to reattach leaving the server process in an inconsistent state."
<!--AutoGenerated/-->
### Description
_There is currently no further description available._
### Example
There is currently no code example available on how to reproduce error 4158. Please modify the code below in a way that can describe how to produce this error.

```csharp
using Starcounter;
using System;

class Program {
    static void Main(string[] args) {
        // Foo can not be successfully invoked if PreFoo() is not
        // invoked previously. If Foo() is called like this, it will
        // generate an error 4158.
        Db.Foo();
    }
}
```

### Resolution
There is currently no code example available on how to remedy error 4158. Please modify the code below in a way that can describe how to remedy this error.

```csharp
using Starcounter;
using System;

class Program {
    static void Main(string[] args) {
        // We call PreFoo() prior to calling Foo(). Now, we will
        // no longer experience error 4158.
        Db.PreFoo();
        Db.Foo();
    }
}
```
